showerReviews.reviewText: Don't know about the shower rooms but the main staff are helpful and they taught both of my kids to swim proficiently by the end of the summer. ‚Ä¶

Shower room smells disgusting from the wet carpet. Drying spinners don't work in the womens' bathrooms. Also, today there was a boy in the shower rooms. Even though he was little, I don't think he should still be in the shower room. Nobody ‚Ä¶
